channel.title: Signature: Thrizzles (10 minutes work)
channel.description: Just a short thread to get opinions on this, took 10 minutes. Tell me what you like/don't like. Side-notes: The quality of the render kinda messed up, I guess it doesn't look as HQ as I originally wanted and also my screen resolution was dimmed which meant it rendered allot darker than intended. - Egor [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/a9p4o.jpg[/img]

item.title: Signature: Thrizzles (10 minutes work)
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

The amount of time a person puts into something varies in quality from person to person.

Read full topic

item.title: Signature: Thrizzles (10 minutes work)
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

10 minutes is long enough to make something basic but good, it takes me 5 minutes to do a basic sword model without materials. This looks horrid, the text is boring and plain, and the lighting doesn’t match. How about instead of presenting an unfinished 10 minute piece, spend 20 minutes making a good one.

Read full topic

item.title: Signature: Thrizzles (10 minutes work)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:4, topic:518881”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=637150.msg4295875#msg4295875 date=1368213986]
Well, I suppose for 10 minutes - it’s not so bad.
[/quote]

10 minutes is actually a long time.[/quote]

10 minutes in Cinema 4D got me this. 10 minutes in terms of graphics is not a lot. OP’s image looks nice, but it could be a lot better if he put more time into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Signature: Thrizzles (10 minutes work)
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Not in graphics development. 10 minutes to a high profile business department would be an insult and you’d get fired. Even if it was perfect. Just because they don’t care for speed. They care for quality.

Read full topic

item.description:

Well, I suppose for 10 minutes - it’s not so bad.

10 minutes is actually a long time.
